pr_title: Refactor DCLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DCLStatement

timeline.message: Refactor some MySQL DCLStatement & SQLServer DCLStatement
Refactor DCLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DCLStatement

timeline.bodyText: I suppose other database SQL  Statements except for MySQL are not wanted here. See the name of this class.
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
I suppose other database SQL Statements except for MySQL are not wanted here. See the name of this class.

@tristaZero I am very sorry for this mistake, and I will check this logic again. 🤣
